org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.triggers

类 EventTimeTrigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.triggers.Trigger<java.lang.Object,TimeWindow>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.triggers.EventTimeTrigger
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    @PublicEvolving
public class EventTimeTrigger
extends Trigger<java.lang.Object,TimeWindow>
    A Trigger that fires once the watermark passes the end of the window to which a pane belongs.
    另请参阅:
    Watermark, 序列化表格

    • 方法详细资料

      • onElement

        public TriggerResult onElement(java.lang.Object element,
                               long timestamp,
                               TimeWindow window,
                               Trigger.TriggerContext ctx)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: Trigger
        Called for every element that gets added to a pane. The result of this will determine whether the pane is evaluated to emit results.
        指定者:
        onElement 在类中 Trigger<java.lang.Object,TimeWindow>
        参数:
        element - The element that arrived.
        timestamp - The timestamp of the element that arrived.
        window - The window to which the element is being added.
        ctx - A context object that can be used to register timer callbacks.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • onEventTime

        public TriggerResult onEventTime(long time,
                                 TimeWindow window,
                                 Trigger.TriggerContext ctx)
        从类复制的说明: Trigger
        Called when an event-time timer that was set using the trigger context fires.

        Note: This method is not called in case the window does not contain any elements. Thus, if you return PURGE from a trigger method and you expect to do cleanup in a future invocation of a timer callback it might be wise to clean any state that you would clean in the timer callback.

        指定者:
        onEventTime 在类中 Trigger<java.lang.Object,TimeWindow>
        参数:
        time - The timestamp at which the timer fired.
        window - The window for which the timer fired.
        ctx - A context object that can be used to register timer callbacks.

      • onProcessingTime

        public TriggerResult onProcessingTime(long time,
                                      TimeWindow window,
                                      Trigger.TriggerContext ctx)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: Trigger
        Called when a processing-time timer that was set using the trigger context fires.

        Note: This method is not called in case the window does not contain any elements. Thus, if you return PURGE from a trigger method and you expect to do cleanup in a future invocation of a timer callback it might be wise to clean any state that you would clean in the timer callback.

        指定者:
        onProcessingTime 在类中 Trigger<java.lang.Object,TimeWindow>
        参数:
        time - The timestamp at which the timer fired.
        window - The window for which the timer fired.
        ctx - A context object that can be used to register timer callbacks.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • clear

        public void clear(TimeWindow window,
                  Trigger.TriggerContext ctx)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: Trigger
        Clears any state that the trigger might still hold for the given window. This is called when a window is purged. Timers set using Trigger.TriggerContext.registerEventTimeTimer(long) and Trigger.TriggerContext.registerProcessingTimeTimer(long) should be deleted here as well as state acquired using Trigger.TriggerContext.getPartitionedState(StateDescriptor).
        指定者:
        clear 在类中 Trigger<java.lang.Object,TimeWindow>
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • canMerge

        public boolean canMerge()
        从类复制的说明: Trigger
        Returns true if this trigger supports merging of trigger state and can therefore be used with a MergingWindowAssigner.

        If this returns true you must properly implement Trigger.onMerge(Window, OnMergeContext)

        覆盖:
        canMerge 在类中 Trigger<java.lang.Object,TimeWindow>

      • onMerge

        public void onMerge(TimeWindow window,
                    Trigger.OnMergeContext ctx)
        从类复制的说明: Trigger
        Called when several windows have been merged into one window by the WindowAssigner.
        覆盖:
        onMerge 在类中 Trigger<java.lang.Object,TimeWindow>
        参数:
        window - The new window that results from the merge.
        ctx - A context object that can be used to register timer callbacks and access state.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object

      • create

        public static EventTimeTrigger create()
        Creates an event-time trigger that fires once the watermark passes the end of the window.

        Once the trigger fires all elements are discarded. Elements that arrive late immediately trigger window evaluation with just this one element.
